content: How do I add an icon or avatar to my Discord profile so it’s not just the “Discord guy” or whatever that thing is? When I try, the system only lets me add an avatar if I sign up for paid Nitro which I don’t want to do. I want a free avatar. Thanks.

Hi <@1272416530390585447> I can help you with this. Click on your profile then click on the discord guy then click edit profile then click on the discord guy and you will see a pencil. This is on desktop. it is similar on mobile.

When I do this, I see three options: 1) upload image (from my photos) 2) get animated avatars, unlock with Nitro (which I don’t want to subscribe to) 3) change decorations. Which option gets me free avatars? I’m using an iPad.
Your best best is to upload an image to replace the default discord image it gives you. I’m not sure what you mean by free avatars, though.
Hi <@1272416530390585447> the free option is "upload from your photos"
you can get/make free avatars by photographing or screenshotting something on your device
Something like what you and Carolyn B have next to your name which doesn’t require paid Nitro. Carolyn just clarified put something in my photo library and upload it (option 1). Thanks.
